products.title: Real. Simple. Joy
products.subtitle: Four distinct flavors, one simple philosophy: real food tastes better.

classic.name: Classic
classic.shortDescription: Sweet dates, crunchy almonds, and tropical coconut.
classic.description: Our signature date ball that started it all. A harmonious blend of sweet dates, crunchy almonds, and tropical coconut. Pure, simple, and absolutely delicious.

lux.name: Lux
lux.shortDescription: A brownie-like experience without the guilt. Rich, dark, and luxurious.
lux.description: For the chocolate lovers. Premium dates blended with almond, walnuts, and rich cocoa powder, studded with 65% dark chocolate chips. Decadent, yet wholesome.

zen.name: Zen
zen.shortDescription: Vibrant green tea energy for focused calm and clarity.
zen.description: Find your moment of peace with this unique blend. Earthy matcha green tea powder harmonizes with pistachios, dates, and cashews, finished with a touch of coconut. A mindful treat.

zesty.name: Zesty
zesty.shortDescription: A bright burst of sunshine with fresh lemon and sweet raisins.
zesty.description: A vibrant twist on our classic recipe. Sweet dates and creamy cashews meet tangy lemon and raisins, all wrapped in delicate coconut. A burst of sunshine in every bite.

productPage.storageInstruction: Keep refrigerated for best freshness. Enjoy within 14 days. For extended shelf life, freeze for up to 1 month.

mission.title: Food that brings balance.
mission.paragraph1: Our mission is simple: to create snacks that are as honest as they are delicious.
mission.paragraph2: We believe that nature provides everything we need to feel energized and vibrant, without unpronouncable ingredients and hidden syrups. That's why our energy balls are made from just a handful of raw, whole, recognizable ingredients.
mission.paragraph3: Every bite is our promise of quality, sustainability, and pure, simple flavor.
mission.quote: "We don't just sell snacks; we advocate for a return to real, whole food."

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: A passion for wholesome, delicious snacks made with real & simple ingredients
about.originP1: We were tired of reading food labels that are packed with artificial sweeteners, preservatives, and unpronounceable additives. We craved something real - food that was honest as it was delicious, the kind of simple, recognizable ingredients our parents and grandparents used in their own kitchens.
about.originP2: That’s where the idea for Better Bites took root. Snacks made with honesty, transparency and integrity, without compromising on taste. We began in a small kitchen, using dates as natural sweetener, adding almonds, cashews and walnuts for natural crunch and nutrition. Coconut, cacao, and matcha brought depth and variety. No cooking required, just raw ingredients blended together with care.
about.originP3_text: simple, grounding snacks that feel as good as they taste.
about.missionText: To provide wholesome, delicious snacks that fuel your active lifestyle while staying true to our commitment to natural ingredients, sustainable practices. We're here to prove that healthy eating doesn't mean sacrificing taste, and that transparency in ingredients should be the norm, not the exception.
about.ctaText: Experience the perfect blend of health and flavor in every bite.
about.naturalDesc: 100% natural ingredients with no artificial additives - just real, simple ingredients you can recognize & trust.
about.handcraftedDesc: Made in small batches with the same attention and care that went into our very first batch.
about.qualityDesc: Clean, thoughtfully sourced ingredients from trusted suppliers who share our commitment to purity.

contact.brandDescription: Handcrafted energy balls made from whole ingredients. Fueling your day, naturally.
